content: --- title: Crew Services description: published: true date: 2025-10-03T09:56:24.304Z tags: editor: markdown dateCreated: 2024-09-05T12:00:21.096Z --- # Crew Info Service ### Request ``` https://riverxtest.sunexpress.com/v1/crew/crewInfo/{crewId}?page={page}&size={size} ``` ### Response ```json { "extraInfo": "Crew Info", "crewId": "80765", "idCardNo": "001049-A", "secondaryId": "C-WE765", "surname": "JOHANSSON", "forenames": "NETTIE", "preferredName": "MATT", "maidenName": "MATHIAS", "title": "MR", "birthDay": "1980-03-10", "birthCity": "STOCKHOLM", "birthCountry": "SWEDEN", "nationality": "SWEDISH", "citizenshipId": "00000000000007", "sex": "F", "bloodType": "A+", "maritalStatus": "M", "marriageDate": "2022-03-10", "category": "C", "period": "134", "employmentDate": "2010-04-11", "firstFlightDate": "2010-05-10", "leaveDate": "2010-05-10", "leaveReason": "Resignation" } ``` ### GraphQL Query Root ``` getCrewInfos ``` # Crew Roster Service ### Request ``` https://riverxtest.sunexpress.com/v1/crew/crewRosters/{crewId}?page={page}&size={size} ``` ### Response ```json { "result": [ { "crewId": "80765", "crewRosters": [ { "extraInfo": "January 2023 rosters are published!", "status": "PUBLISHED", "publishDate": "2022-12-28T13:00:00Z", "periodStart": "2023-01-02T00:00:00Z", "periodEnd": "2023-02-01T00:00:00Z", "totalExpectedFatigue": 0, "rosterId": "840c7818-6fa9-42d7-a180-f598e3d416df" } ] } ], "totalPage": 1, "totalItem": 1 } ``` ### GraphQL Query Root ``` getCrewRosters ``` # Crew Pairs/Trips Service ### Request ``` https://riverxtest.sunexpress.com/v1/crew/trips/{crewId}?page={page}&size={size} ``` ### Response ```json { "result": [ { "crewId": "80765", "crewPairTrips": [ { "extraInfo": "Pair Info", "tripId": "1188852", "startDate": "2023-01-09T00:00:00Z", "endDate": "2023-01-09T00:00:00Z", "numberOfDuties": 1, "numberOfActivities": 4, "numberOfLandings": 4, "status": "FINISHED", "totalDutyTime": "577", "totalBlockTime": "356", "totalRestTime": "0", "rosterId": "840c78
